com.interpss.core.algo

Interface LfAdjustAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LfAdjustAlgorithmImpl

    public interface LfAdjustAlgorithm
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'Lf Adjust Config'. Loadflow bus/branch adjustment/control algorithm implementation class

    The following features are supported:

    • Apply Adjust Algo
    • Activate All Adjust
    • Limit Backoff Check
    • Acc Factor Config
    • Volt Adj Config
    • Power Adj Config
    • Lf Algo
    See Also:
    CoreAlgorithmPackage.getLfAdjustAlgorithm()

    • Method Detail

      • isApplyAdjustAlgo

        boolean isApplyAdjustAlgo()
        Returns the value of the 'Apply Adjust Algo' attribute. The default value is "true".

        If the meaning of the 'Apply Adjust Algo' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        attribute to control if Adjustment/control should be applied during the Loadflow calculation process.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Apply Adjust Algo' attribute.
        See Also:
        setApplyAdjustAlgo(boolean), CoreAlgorithmPackage.getLfAdjustAlgorithm_ApplyAdjustAlgo()

      • getLfAlgo

        LoadflowAlgorithm getLfAlgo()
        Returns the value of the 'Lf Algo' container reference. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Lf Adj Algo'.

        If the meaning of the 'Lf Algo' reference isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        reference to the parant Loadflow algorithm object, containing this adjustment/control algorithm object.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Lf Algo' container reference.
        See Also:
        setLfAlgo(LoadflowAlgorithm), CoreAlgorithmPackage.getLfAdjustAlgorithm_LfAlgo(), LoadflowAlgorithm.getLfAdjAlgo()

      • needAdjustment

        boolean needAdjustment()
                throws IpssNumericException
        Check to see if there is any adjustment need in the network. It is only used for LF convergence checking.
        Throws:
        IpssNumericException

      • doAllAdjust

        void doAllAdjust(Mismatch mismatch,
                 AclfMethodType lfMethod)
        Perform all adjust in the network, including Bus, Branch adjustment. Network level adjustment is done in the NetAdjustAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        mismatch - Max LF calculation mismatch in the parent network for controlling if the adjustment/control should be started.
        lfMethod - Aclf method
